channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tormented by a Teleprompter, Biden Flails in Attempt to Shore Up His Economic Legacy
item.description: When the Biden interregnum is remembered at all, it will likely be as a lesson in the perils of governmental overreach.
